The qualities that lead to fame and reno: When they discard this corpse they go to heaven
The qualities to be given up and attaine: Chains don’t torment one who has nothing
Not clinging to name and form
The qualities of the wise and the foolis: Fools and half-wits devote themselves to negligence
The wise protect diligence as their best treasure
If you’re diligent and practice absorption, you’ll attain ultimate happiness
